Tomato___Late_blight.description: Caused by the oomycete Phytophthora infestans. Leads to dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves and fruit.

commercial.frequency: Spray every 7-10 days during wet conditions
commercial.notes: Apply preventively before symptoms appear for best results. Rotate with copper-based fungicides to avoid resistance.

jugaad.notes: Traditional home remedy. Raises leaf surface pH, inhibiting fungal spore germination. Remove severely infected leaves first.
